Thus saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> to his anointed<S>4899</S>, to Cyrus<S>3566</S>, whose right hand<S>3225</S> I have holden<S>2388</S>, to subdue<S>7286</S> nations<S>1471</S> before<S>6440</S> him; and I will loose<S>6605</S> the loins<S>4975</S> of kings<S>4428</S>, to open<S>6605</S> before<S>6440</S> him the two leaved gates<S>1817</S>; and the gates<S>8179</S> shall not be shut<S>5462</S>; <sup>have: or, strengthened</sup>
I will go<S>3212</S> before<S>6440</S> thee, and make<S>3474</S> the crooked places<S>1921</S> straight<S>3474</S> <S>3474</S>: I will break in pieces<S>7665</S> the gates<S>1817</S> of brass<S>5154</S>, and cut in sunder<S>1438</S> the bars<S>1280</S> of iron<S>1270</S>:
And I will give<S>5414</S> thee the treasures<S>214</S> of darkness<S>2822</S>, and hidden riches<S>4301</S> of secret places<S>4565</S>, that thou mayest know<S>3045</S> that I, the LORD<S>3068</S>, which call<S>7121</S> thee by thy name<S>8034</S>, am the God<S>430</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>.
For Jacob<S>3290</S> my servant's<S>5650</S> sake, and Israel<S>3478</S> mine elect<S>972</S>, I have even called<S>7121</S> thee by thy name<S>8034</S>: I have surnamed<S>3655</S> thee, though thou hast not known<S>3045</S> me.
I am the LORD<S>3068</S>, and there is none else, there is no God<S>430</S> beside<S>2108</S> me: I girded<S>247</S> thee, though thou hast not known<S>3045</S> me:
That they may know<S>3045</S> from the rising<S>4217</S> of the sun<S>8121</S>, and from the west<S>4628</S>, that there is none<S>657</S> beside<S>1107</S> me. I am the LORD<S>3068</S>, and there is none else.
I form<S>3335</S> the light<S>216</S>, and create<S>1254</S> darkness<S>2822</S>: I make<S>6213</S> peace<S>7965</S>, and create<S>1254</S> evil<S>7451</S>: I the LORD<S>3068</S> do<S>6213</S> all these things.
Drop down<S>7491</S>, ye heavens<S>8064</S>, from above<S>4605</S>, and let the skies<S>7834</S> pour down<S>5140</S> righteousness<S>6664</S>: let the earth<S>776</S> open<S>6605</S>, and let them bring forth<S>6509</S> salvation<S>3468</S>, and let righteousness<S>6666</S> spring up<S>6779</S> together<S>3162</S>; I the LORD<S>3068</S> have created<S>1254</S> it.
Woe<S>1945</S> unto him that striveth<S>7378</S> with his Maker<S>3335</S>! Let the potsherd<S>2789</S> strive with the potsherds<S>2789</S> of the earth<S>127</S>. Shall the clay<S>2563</S> say<S>559</S> to him that fashioneth<S>3335</S> it, What makest<S>6213</S> thou? or thy work<S>6467</S>, He hath no hands<S>3027</S>?
Woe<S>1945</S> unto him that saith<S>559</S> unto his father<S>1</S>, What begettest<S>3205</S> thou? or to the woman<S>802</S>, What hast thou brought forth<S>2342</S>?
Thus saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>, the Holy One<S>6918</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, and his Maker<S>3335</S>, Ask<S>7592</S> me of things to come<S>857</S> concerning my sons<S>1121</S>, and concerning the work<S>6467</S> of my hands<S>3027</S> command<S>6680</S> ye me.
I have made<S>6213</S> the earth<S>776</S>, and created<S>1254</S> man<S>120</S> upon it: I, even my hands<S>3027</S>, have stretched out<S>5186</S> the heavens<S>8064</S>, and all their host<S>6635</S> have I commanded<S>6680</S>.
I have raised him up<S>5782</S> in righteousness<S>6664</S>, and I will direct<S>3474</S> all his ways<S>1870</S>: he shall build<S>1129</S> my city<S>5892</S>, and he shall let go<S>7971</S> my captives<S>1546</S>, not for price<S>4242</S> nor reward<S>7810</S>, saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> of hosts<S>6635</S>. <sup>direct: or, make straight</sup>
Thus saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>, The labour<S>3018</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>, and merchandise<S>5505</S> of Ethiopia<S>3568</S> and of the Sabeans<S>5436</S>, men<S>582</S> of stature<S>4060</S>, shall come over<S>5674</S> unto thee, and they shall be thine: they shall come<S>3212</S> after<S>310</S> thee; in chains<S>2131</S> they shall come over<S>5674</S>, and they shall fall down<S>7812</S> unto thee, they shall make supplication<S>6419</S> unto thee, saying, Surely God<S>410</S> is in thee; and there is none else, there is no<S>657</S> God<S>430</S>.
Verily<S>403</S> thou art a God<S>410</S> that hidest<S>5641</S> thyself, O God<S>430</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, the Saviour<S>3467</S>.
They shall be ashamed<S>954</S>, and also confounded<S>3637</S>, all of them: they shall go<S>1980</S> to confusion<S>3639</S> together<S>3162</S> that are makers<S>2796</S> of idols<S>6736</S>.
But Israel<S>3478</S> shall be saved<S>3467</S> in the LORD<S>3068</S> with an everlasting<S>5769</S> salvation<S>8668</S>: ye shall not be ashamed<S>954</S> nor confounded<S>3637</S> world<S>5769</S> without end<S>5703</S>.
For thus saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> that created<S>1254</S> the heavens<S>8064</S>; God<S>430</S> himself that formed<S>3335</S> the earth<S>776</S> and made<S>6213</S> it; he hath established<S>3559</S> it, he created<S>1254</S> it not in vain<S>8414</S>, he formed<S>3335</S> it to be inhabited<S>3427</S>: I am the LORD<S>3068</S>; and there is none else.
I have not spoken<S>1696</S> in secret<S>5643</S>, in a dark<S>2822</S> place<S>4725</S> of the earth<S>776</S>: I said<S>559</S> not unto the seed<S>2233</S> of Jacob<S>3290</S>, Seek<S>1245</S> ye me in vain<S>8414</S>: I the LORD<S>3068</S> speak<S>1696</S> righteousness<S>6664</S>, I declare<S>5046</S> things that are right<S>4339</S>.
Assemble<S>6908</S> yourselves and come<S>935</S>; draw near<S>5066</S> together<S>3162</S>, ye that are escaped<S>6412</S> of the nations<S>1471</S>: they have no knowledge<S>3045</S> that set up<S>5375</S> the wood<S>6086</S> of their graven image<S>6459</S>, and pray<S>6419</S> unto a god<S>410</S> that cannot save<S>3467</S>.
Tell<S>5046</S> ye, and bring them near<S>5066</S>; yea, let them take counsel<S>3289</S> together<S>3162</S>: who hath declared<S>8085</S> this from ancient time<S>6924</S>? who hath told<S>5046</S> it from that time? have not I the LORD<S>3068</S>? and there is no God<S>430</S> else beside<S>1107</S> me; a just<S>6662</S> God<S>410</S> and a Saviour<S>3467</S>; there is none<S>369</S> beside<S>2108</S> me.
Look<S>6437</S> unto me, and be ye saved<S>3467</S>, all the ends<S>657</S> of the earth<S>776</S>: for I am God<S>410</S>, and there is none else.
I have sworn<S>7650</S> by myself, the word<S>1697</S> is gone out<S>3318</S> of my mouth<S>6310</S> in righteousness<S>6666</S>, and shall not return<S>7725</S>, That unto me every knee<S>1290</S> shall bow<S>3766</S>, every tongue<S>3956</S> shall swear<S>7650</S>.
Surely, shall one say<S>559</S>, in the LORD<S>3068</S> have I righteousness<S>6666</S> and strength<S>5797</S>: even to him shall men come<S>935</S>; and all that are incensed<S>2734</S> against him shall be ashamed<S>954</S>. <sup>Surely: or, Surely he shall say of me, In the LORD is all righteousness and strength</sup> <sup>righteousness: Heb. righteousnesses</sup>
In the LORD<S>3068</S> shall all the seed<S>2233</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> be justified<S>6663</S>, and shall glory<S>1984</S>.
